utils

Class BitUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.BitUtils

  • public final class BitUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class containing all bit twiddling hacks and the like
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    EPICI

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int binLog(int bits)
      Fast (floor) log base 2 for integers Taken from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3305059/how-do-you-calculate-log-base-2-in-java-for-integers#3305710 Returns 0 for 0
      If the original number was a power of 2, 1<<(the returned result) should be original number
      static boolean isPo2(int bits)
      Fast power of 2 test Also returns true for 0, even though it isn't a power of 2
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main method, used only for testing

      • binLog

        public static int binLog(int bits)
        Fast (floor) log base 2 for integers Taken from http://stackoverflow.com/questions/3305059/how-do-you-calculate-log-base-2-in-java-for-integers#3305710 Returns 0 for 0
        If the original number was a power of 2, 1<<(the returned result) should be original number
        Parameters:
        bits - the integer to calculate the log base 2 of
        Returns:
        the log base 2 of that integer

      • isPo2

        public static boolean isPo2(int bits)
        Fast power of 2 test Also returns true for 0, even though it isn't a power of 2
        Parameters:
        bits - the number to test
        Returns:
        true if the number is a power of 2
